radiographic_examinations.findings: Significant amount of pericecal stranding with a pocket of free air adjacent to the stranding. The appendix measures up to 8 mm with air in its tip and no periappendiceal inflammation. Associated inflammatory lymph nodes in an ileocolic distribution, largest measuring 6 mm. No intra-abdominal free fluid or retroperitoneal lymphadenopathy. Multiple diverticula in the sigmoid colon compatible with diverticulosis.
